ingredients: 1 cup (6 ounces) coarsely chopped yellow onion
¾ cup (4 ounces) coarsely chopped celery
½ cup (3.25 ounces) coarsely chopped carrots
½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
1 can (28 ounces) no-salt-added crushed tomatoes, undrained
2½ cups (10 ounces) shredded mozzarella cheese, divided
1 cup (4 ounces) grated Parmesan cheese, divided
